    • Method Detail

      • createMultiLineContentNotificationView

        public static android.widget.RemoteViews createMultiLineContentNotificationView(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                android.os.Bundle notificationExtras,
                                                                                int smallIconResourceId,
                                                                                boolean showSmallIcon)
        Returns a custom multi-line push notification view. For devices running Jelly Bean+, you should use the native BigTextStyle to get this functionality.
        Parameters:
        context -
        notificationExtras -
        smallIconResourceId - the resource id of the small icon defined in appboy.xml as com_appboy_push_small_notification_icon
        showSmallIcon - whether or not to custom display the small icon in the remote view. If an icon outside of the remote view itself will be displayed, pass in false to avoid redundant icon display.
        Returns:
        a RemoteViews instance representing the notification or null if the view cannot be created.
